translation.intro-text: App-ka DA ServePro waxuu ka caawiyaa milkiilayaasha dukaamada iyo shaqaalaha inay si wax ku ool ah u dabagashadaan waxqabadka iibka. Ku habboon F&B, iibka cusboonaysiinta iyo adeegyada.
translation.feature2-text: Dabagasho waqtiga dhabta ah qalabka oo dhan
translation.feature3-text: Soo koobidka dakhliga, dalabyada iyo alaabta ugu iibsiga badan ee si toos ah loo sameeyo
translation.feature4-text: Deji doorooyin iyo ogolaansho gaar ah shaqaale kasta
translation.feature5-text: Xogta waa la isdhexgeliyaa oo la kaydiyay si amaan ah
translation.feature6-text: 2-layer encryption, xoghaye kaliya ayaa heli kara
translation.address: Cinwaanka: 52 D1 Street, Phuoc Long B, Thu Duc, Magaalada Ho Chi Minh
